file_content.text: What's happened? What did you do to me?
You're not my son. Bring me that treacherous scoundrel so I can cut him open!
I can Force walk, ghost. I'm taking your power for my own.
Your son is not here.
You're not my daughter. Bring me that treacherous she-dog so I can cut her open!
This is called the Force walk. I'm taking your power for my own.
Your daughter's not here.
And to think I scoffed when they told me such a ritual existed.
I'm binding you to me. You can come the easy way or the hard way.
Don't be difficult.
What about "not at all"?
What does it look like I'm doing?
I'm shutting you up.
Yes, I recognize it now. The ritual of Force walking. I'd heard of it, but I didn't believe it existed.
Do you really think you can handle my power? It doesn't matter.
You won't have me. This is my last stronghold... and I won't be your slave!
I will free you when I'm done.
It's only temporary.
You will free me? I will not be bound to you, or to this tomb? Seal the pact in blood, and I will come.
It is sealed. [Draw blood]
Good. [Draw blood]
My strength is yours. But I will hold you to your promise of freedom.
On second thought, I'll just take you.
Never mind. [Bind him]
I think you misheard. I wasn't asking.
The hard way it is. [Bind him]
Then I guess I'll force you to come with me.
Yes, you will. [Bind him]
You treacherous...!
Well done. With the power of this ghost and of the other, you may shield yourself against Thanaton's wrath.
Take this one's writings and show Thanaton what a good apprentice you've been.
Back again. I hear your slithering. Venom-toothed viper. The only cure for madness is madness!
Venom-toothed vipers, always slithering, slithering. Up the walls, along the floors.
Trespasser! Trespasser! You'll not have it. It's mine. It's the last place in the galaxy that's mine!
I just want the writings.
You can have the tomb.
Never satisfied are you, my apprentice?
Darth Andru, I presume?
[Bow] My lord.
Don't mock me, my apprentice. You know me. You killed me.
You make no sense.
Don't pretend you don't know your own treachery.
The poison still fresh in my body, you defile my tomb. You and your brother both.
The poison still fresh in my body, you defile my tomb. You and your sister both.
The venom may have burned away my sight, but I know you. Don't make my mistake--strangle your children at birth!
I didn't kill you, and whoever did is dead by now. You can be at rest.
Calm down.
Rest? Never. I must protect what I have from vipers like you.
I'm not here to chat.
Ahem. The writings.
You will die before I hand over my writings!
I'm sorry your offspring murdered you, but strangling all children may not be the solution.
Suggestion noted.
Solution? Death is the only solution for vipers like you!
Enough!
Foolish child! Twice now you've walked into the still-inhabited tomb of a Sith Lord unprepared!
Look around you! See the bones! The tattered robes! This is where Thanaton leads those he despises to death. You follow him blindly when you should plan to defeat him!
I could've defeated that ghost easily, until you got in the way.
You shouldn't have intervened.
You can't attack a ghost with your lightning or your weapons. Only powerful rituals can "defeat" the dead.
What should I do?
Darth Thanaton has no reason to kill me.
That's nonsense.
He is Sith. He does not need a reason!
Listen, flesh of my flesh. I have felt something in you since the day we met.
You have a rare pull among ghosts. It's a source of great power, but it has destroyed many a Sith. It's your only chance against Thanaton.
You should have told me about this sooner.
Why didn't you inform me?
Not even I understand what I really am. Ghosts are one of the Force's many mysteries and even Sith should be wary of them.
What do you mean I have a "pull" on the dead?
A pull among ghosts?
They sense you from far away, as I did, and you rouse strong emotions in them, as with this ghost.
I'm listening.
In my time, there were mystical movements among the Sith that sought to communicate with ghosts and harness their power.
A Sith named Ergast was said to devour ghosts the way your Dashade devours Force users. His knowledge was buried with him near the Dark Temple. Seek this knowledge.
I hope this knowledge does what you say.
I hope you're right.
Good luck, flesh of my flesh.
I don't see how this ritual will save me from Thanaton.
How will that help?
Thanaton wants you dead. Defeating this ghost will not only get you the writings but also give you immense power.
What if I can't learn this ritual?
What if it doesn't work?
You are a Lord of the Sith. Use the resources at your disposal.
Don't make me remind you again that you are the last hope of our lineage.
You must augment your power before you face Thanaton. I will not have the strength to defend you again.
